import React from 'react'; import emptyHeart from '../../assets/likeImg.png'; import fullHeart from '../../assets/likedIMG.png'; export default function VacationComponent({props}: any) { return (
{props.validateVacationIsNotLikedByTheUser(props.vacation) ? {props.onVacationFollowAttempt(props.vacation)}} alt="Like Button"/> : {props.onVacationFollowAttempt(props.vacation)}} alt="Like Button"/> }

{props.vacation.followersCount}

{props.vacation.vacationDescription}

{props.vacation.startDate}

-

{props.vacation.endDate}

{props.vacation.vacationPrice} $

) }
